description: This file defines the 'Tile' class used in a 2048 puzzle game frontend, representing individual tiles with properties like id, value, position, and status.

classes.name: Tile
classes.description: Immutable class representing a game tile with properties for identification, value, position, and whether it is newly spawned.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Tile with optional overridden properties.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the Tile for debugging or display purposes.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Overrides equality operator to compare Tiles based on their properties.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Provides a hash code based on the Tile's properties for use in collections.
